ai-patthana21.2:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.2:0.3_0: Skill in what is allowable and excess.
ai-patthana21.2:1.1_0: Not by cause or reason, something cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.2:2.1_0: Not by reason, not cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.2:2.1_1: One is the cause of reason why the object of three kinds of intention,
ai-patthana21.2:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.2:3.1_0: Not by reason, only if it has no cause or reason, it doesn’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.2:3.1_2: Not for the sake of cause or reason,
ai-patthana21.2:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.2:5.1_0: roots and all with no single roots.
ai-patthana21.2:6.1_0: And they don’t cause or reason for the sake of profitable root, or for the sake of the skillful and for the sake of all profitable states.
ai-patthana21.2:6.1_1: And they don’t cause or reason for the sake of profitable Teaching or for the sake of skillful, or for the sake of the skillful.
ai-patthana21.2:6.1_2: ‘It’s not possible for the sake of profit and not skilled in profitable roots or cause or reasons.’
ai-patthana21.2:7.1_0: It is not the cause, nor is the reason for the sake of profitable, or for the sake of profitable states, and for the sake of all the profitable states.
ai-patthana21.2:8.1_0: It is not possible for the sake of a cause or condition, nor for the sake of skillful qualities, or for the sake of profitable states.
ai-patthana21.2:9.1_0: nine supports for the object, and there is nine projects.
ai-patthana21.2:10.1_0: It is not possible for the sake of profit and not skilled in the reason for the sake of the teaching.
ai-patthana21.2:10.1_1: nine supports for the object, and there is nine projects.
ai-patthana21.2:11.1_0: ‘The cause or reasons that cause and reasons not to have cause or condition.’ ...
ai-patthana21.2:11.1_1: Ninely interruptedly, there is nothing between the monasteries and transmigration in the next life. There is no nine orifices that is new.
